alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:38PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN CASS AND SOUTHWESTERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM CDT... At 638 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Poplar, to Leader, to near Gull Lake, to near Baxter, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Weather station at the Staples Airport recorded a wind gust of 35 mph. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Baxter around 655 PM CDT. Brainerd and Gull Lake around 705 PM CDT. Upper South Long Lake around 710 PM CDT. Pequot Lakes, Nisswa and Merrifield around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Sylvan, Legionville, North Long Lake, Crow Wing State Park, Lake Hubert, Lake Shore, Barrows, Edward Lake, Casino and Esterdy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
